content.question: In the passage above, Horace makes two related observations on the theme of "the golden mean."(a) Write out and translate two images that Horace uses in lines 1-4 (Saepius . . . montes) to illustrate this theme. (b) Briefly explain how these images illustrate the theme.

frqParts.text: In the passage above, Horace makes two related observations on the theme of "the golden mean."(a) Write out and translate two images that Horace uses in lines 1-4 (Saepius . . . montes) to illustrate this theme. (b) Briefly explain how these images illustrate the theme.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
